title: Sprouts
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Raw, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering
description: A 100% organic plant based restaurant. Serves a weekly changing menu in a fresh & cozy contemporary atmosphere. Uses many local ingredients when possible. Specializes in raw food desserts. Drinks are organic and mostly sugar free. Extensive wine list available. Prefers reservations, but walk-ins are welcome.
streetAddress: Baron Frans du Fourstraat 4 bus 7, Tweetorentjesplein/Bloemekesgang
